Uses of Class
nl.inl.blacklab.search.TextPattern

  • Packages that use TextPattern 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.corpusql
    Parser for Corpus Query Language.
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene
    Parser for Lucene Query Language that produces TextPattern's instead of Query's.
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.lucene.helpers
    Some helper classes for the Lucene Query Language parser.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences
    Classes dealing with regex-like patterns of token-level queries, like required for CorpusQL.

    • Uses of TextPattern in nl.inl.blacklab.search

      Subclasses of TextPattern in nl.inl.blacklab.search 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TextPatternAnd
      AND query for combining different properties from a complex field.
      class  TextPatternBoolean
      A TextPattern that performs document-level combining of boolean clauses.
      class  TextPatternCaptureGroup
      TextPattern for capturing a subclause as a named "group".
      class  TextPatternCombiner
      Abstract base class for combining several text patterns into a single new compound TextPattern
      class  TextPatternContaining
      A TextPattern searching for TextPatterns that contain a hit from another TextPattern.
      class  TextPatternDocLevelAnd
      A TextPattern returning hits from all clauses, but only in documents that match all clauses.
      class  TextPatternDocLevelAndNot
      A TextPattern returning hits from the "include" clause, but only in documents where the "exclude" clause doesn't occur.
      class  TextPatternEdge
      Returns either the left edge or right edge of the specified query.
      class  TextPatternFuzzy
      A TextPattern matching a word with fuzzy matching.
      class  TextPatternNot
      NOT operator for TextPattern queries at token and sequence level
      class  TextPatternOr
      A TextPattern matching at least one of its child clauses.
      class  TextPatternPrefix
      A TextPattern matching words that start with the specified prefix.
      class  TextPatternProperty
      TextPattern for wrapping another TextPattern so that it applies to a certain word property.
      class  TextPatternRegex
      A TextPattern matching a regular expression.
      class  TextPatternSensitive
      TextPattern for wrapping another TextPattern so that it applies to a certain word property.
      class  TextPatternTags
      A TextPattern matching a word.
      class  TextPatternTerm
      A TextPattern matching a word.
      class  TextPatternWildcard
      A textpattern matching a simple wildcard expression.
      class  TextPatternWithin
      A TextPattern searching for a TextPattern inside the hits from another TextPattern.
